page.title: 19Flora in Clevedon's Woods
page.content:
Class 2 of East Clevedon Primary School made this survey of local flora,on walks through Court Wood and Norton's Wood. We identified the following...... Ox_eye daisy..yarrow..marshwort.. ragwort..common mallow..speedwell.. Lady's Bedstraw..self_heal..rosebay willowherb..Hart's Tongue fern.. periwinkle..Herb Robert (this was extremely common)..Herb Benet.. convolvulus(this was also very common)..white campion and red campion (these were two more common wild flowers)..scarlet pimpernel..creeping cinquefoil..valerian..alkanet..Lord's and Ladies..bindweed..Marsh Hawk's Beard..
compiled by Sarah Webster,Rebecca Lodge and Michelle Woodward.
